text: April 2025 unemployment rates ranged from 1.8% in SD to 5.8% in DC.
Q1 2025 house price growth over the year ranged from -2.2% in HI to 11.4% in RI.
Q4 2024 real state GDP growth over the year ranged from -2.3% in ND to 4.6% in AR.
Among states, April 2025 average weekly earnings ranged from NM’s $985 to WA’s $1,431.
Only CT and WV saw state and local public jobs fall between April 2024 and April 2025.
AZ’s real manufacturing GDP grew from $29 billion to $47 billion over the past 10 years.
Only ND has seen year-over-year house price growth every quarter since Q1 2011.
Every state and DC saw year-over-year retail GDP growth exceed 3% in real terms in Q4 2024.
In April 2025, private-sector employment fell below April 2024 levels in IA, KS, and MO.
